languages.text: Действия одного из персонажей во время {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. В свой ход персонаж может потратить {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на передвижение, а {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} на атакующее действие или использование {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. В бою порядок действий имеет значение. Персонаж может передвигаться по полю только до тех пор, пока не совершит атакующее действие. Атаковав противников, персонаж лишается оставшихся очков передвижения и не может двигаться до начала своего следующего хода. Исключение — если персонаж получил ОП после атаки (любым способом).

The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.
languages.original_text: Действия одного из персонажей во время {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. В свой ход персонаж может потратить {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} на передвижение, а {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} на атакующее действие или использование {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. В бою порядок действий имеет значение. Персонаж может передвигаться по полю только до тех пор, пока не совершит атакующее действие. Атаковав противников, персонаж лишается оставшихся очков передвижения и не может двигаться до начала своего следующего хода. Исключение — если персонаж получил ОП после атаки (любым способом).

traits.locale_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their abilities. The order you take actions in combat makes a difference. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

The order you take actions in combat makes a difference. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. languages.text: Die Summe der Aktionen eines Charakters während einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. In seinem Zug kann ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} ausgeben, um sich zu bewegen, und {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}, um eine Angriffsaktion durchzuführen oder seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zu nutzen. Die Reihenfolge, in der du im Kampf Aktionen ausführst, ist wichtig. Ein Charakter kann sich nur auf dem Schlachtfeld bewegen, bevor er eine Angriffsaktion durchführt. Sobald ein Charakter angreift, verliert er seine restlichen Bewegungspunkte und kann sich bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zugs nicht mehr bewegen. Es gibt jedoch eine Möglichkeit, dies zu umgehen, zum Beispiel wenn der Charakter nach einem Angriff Bewegungspunkte zurückgewinnen kann.
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text: Die Summe der Aktionen eines Charakters während einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. In seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kann ein Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} ausgeben, um sich zu bewegen, und {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}, um eine Angriffsaktion durchzuführen oder seine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} zu nutzen. Die Reihenfolge, in der du im Kampf Aktionen ausführst, ist wichtig. Ein Charakter kann sich nur auf dem Schlachtfeld bewegen, bevor er eine Angriffsaktion durchführt. Sobald ein Charakter angreift, verliert er seine restlichen Bewegungspunkte und kann sich bis zum Beginn seines nächsten Zuges nicht mehr bewegen. Es gibt jedoch eine Möglichkeit, dies zu umgehen, zum Beispiel wenn der Charakter nach einem Angriff Bewegungspunkte zurückgewinnen kann.

languages.text: Somme des actions d'un personnage au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Lors de son tour, un personnage peut utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pour se déplacer et des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} pour effectuer une attaque ou utiliser ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. L'ordre dans lequel vous effectuez vos actions au combat n'est pas anodin. Un personnage peut uniquement se déplacer sur le champ de bataille avant une attaque. Après avoir attaqué, le personnage perd ses points de déplacement restants et ne peut plus se déplacer jusqu'à son tour suivant. Il est néanmoins possible de contourner ce problème si, par exemple, le personnage dispose d'un moyen de gagner des points de déplacement après avoir attaqué.
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text: Somme des actions d'un personnage au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, un personnage peut utiliser des {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} pour se déplacer et des {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}points d'action{/g} pour effectuer une action d'attaque ou utiliser ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. L'ordre dans lequel vous effectuez vos actions au combat n'est pas anodin. Un personnage peut uniquement se déplacer sur le champ de bataille avant une action d'attaque. Après avoir attaqué, le personnage perd ses points de déplacement restants et ne peut plus se déplacer jusqu'à son tour suivant. Il est cependant possible de contourner ce problème si, par exemple, le personnage dispose d'un moyen de gagner des points de déplacement après avoir attaqué.

languages.text: 角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中进行动作的机会。在角色的回合中，角色可以耗费{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}实施攻击动作，或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。战斗中，行动顺序非常重要。您的角色只能先移动，再执行攻击动作。 角色进行攻击之后，会失去所有剩余移动点数，在下个回合开始前都无法移动。不过，部分时候在角色攻击之后依然可以移动。比如说，部分能力在攻击之后可以让角色获得额外移动点数。
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text: 角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中进行动作的机会。在角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，角色可以耗费{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}实施攻击动作，或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。战斗中，行动顺序非常重要。您的角色只能先移动，再执行攻击动作。 角色进行攻击之后，会失去所有剩余移动点数，在下个回合开始前都无法移动。不过，部分时候在角色攻击之后依然可以移动。比如说，部分能力在攻击之后可以让角色获得额外移动点数。

languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their abilities. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

languages.text: La suma de todas las acciones de un personaje durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. En su turno, los personajes pueden usar {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse y {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} para atacar o utilizar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. El orden de tus acciones en combate es importante. Los personajes solo pueden moverse por el campo de batalla antes de lanzar una acción de ataque. Al atacar, pierde sus puntos de movimiento restantes y no puede moverse hasta el principio de su siguiente turno. Es posible evitar esto si, por ejemplo, el personaje tiene alguna forma de obtener puntos de movimiento después de atacar.
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text: La suma de todas las acciones de un personaje durante un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. En su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, los personajes pueden usar {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse y {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g} para atacar o utilizar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. El orden de tus acciones en combate es importante. Los personajes solo pueden moverse por el campo de batalla antes de lanzar una acción de ataque. Al atacar, pierde sus puntos de movimiento restantes y no puede moverse hasta el principio de su siguiente turno. Es posible evitar esto si, por ejemplo, el personaje tiene alguna forma de obtener puntos de movimiento después de atacar.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中のキャラクターのアクションの合計。ターン中、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を使用して移動、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を使用して攻撃することが可能。また自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用することができる。戦闘中に起こすアクションの順番が重要である。キャラクターは攻撃アクションを実行する前だけ戦場を移動できる。 一度攻撃したキャラクターは、残りの移動ポイントを失い、次のターンの開始まで移動できなくなる。ただし、キャラクターが攻撃後に移動ポイントを獲得する何らかの方法を持っている場合などは、これを回避することができる。
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中のキャラクターのアクションの合計。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を使用して移動、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}を使用して攻撃することが可能。また自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用することができる。戦闘中に起こすアクションの順番が重要である。キャラクターは攻撃アクションを実行する前だけ戦場を移動できる。 一度攻撃したキャラクターは、残りの移動ポイントを失い、次のターンの開始まで移動できなくなる。ただし、キャラクターが攻撃後に移動ポイントを獲得する何らかの方法を持っている場合などは、これを回避することができる。

languages.text: Bir karakterin bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sırasındaki eylemlerinin toplamı. Karakter, turu sırasında hareket etmek için {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g}; saldırı eylemi gerçekleştirmek veya {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerini{/g} kullanmak için {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}eylem puanı{/g} harcayabilir. Çatışmada eylemleri hangi sıra ile yaptığın önemlidir. Bir karakter, çatışma alanında yalnızca herhangi bir saldırı eylemi yapmadan önce hareket edebilir. Bir karakter saldırdığında, kalan hareket puanlarını kaybeder ve bir sonraki turu başlayana kadar hareket edemez. Bununla beraber, karakterin saldırdıktan sonra hareket puanı kazanabileceği bir yol varsa bu sınırlamayı aşmak mümkündür.
languages.original_text: The sum of a character's actions during a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. On their turn, a character can spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} to move and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g} to perform an attack action or use their {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. The order in which you take actions in combat matters. A character can only move around the battlefield before they take an attack action. Once a character attacks, they lose their remaining movement points, unable to move until the start of their next turn. There is a way around this, however, if, for example, the character has some way of gaining movement points after attacking.
